main.partner: Our mission is as follows: Professionalism is a requirement of our daily work and the purpose of our presence in the market in a changing world.
main.partner2: We live in unsettled and turbulent times. Don't worry, ZESS Consulting will show you where to go. We actively help you, support you, and share our knowledge with you. Quality is our guide. Where there is quality, there is success. So - we are together: STRONG - AMBITIOUS - RESILIENT. You can rely on us! We are honest, transparent, and open. Tell us about your goal, and we will find the optimal solution for you together. We pay great attention to communication and take the time to achieve our common goal.

ram.text1: “We are a young team. Since 1999, we have been located in Germany and the EU. We have accumulated rich experience in the field of education, project management, and EU legislation for providing services and communication with applicants from the CIS and employers in the EU.”
ram.text2: We provide a unique opportunity for students from Central Asia to work in Germany during vacation time
ram.text4: ZESS Consulting - your competent partner for personnel recruitment from Kyrgyzstan and Central Asia (e.g., Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan). By providing individual personnel services, we support your company precisely when it is necessary. We offer you a complete package of services: from short-term employment during vacations and peak orders to the recruitment of personnel that exactly meets your requirements. Qualified and reliable
ram.text5: Do you need reinforcements for your team but don't have time for intensive searching? Then use our direct personnel recruitment service: our experienced specialists take over the entire personnel selection process for you. Quickly and systematically.
ram.text6: ➔ Broad access to relevant target groups
ram.text7: ➔ Short processing time for your request
ram.text8: ➔ Experience in the European market and consideration of the peculiarities of working in the CIS market
ram.text9: ➔ Development of a qualification enhancement plan
ram.text11: As a student of an educational institution, you have the opportunity to gain work experience in Germany during summer holidays (60 or 90 days). During work, you follow a clear working schedule in accordance with current laws, with days off. Free time can be used to get to know the country and travel through Europe. To participate in the program, students in day study with basic knowledge of a foreign language (German or English) are invited. The level of foreign language knowledge should be sufficient for communication with colleagues and for everyday communication. If necessary, language courses are provided.
ram.text12: All applicants have a permanent contact person to turn to for advice and support.
ram.text13: We have a rich network of contacts to employers, and we have long-term agreements for employment at different levels of qualification - from employment as a student during holidays to short-term employment as a specialist.

sheme.text1: Fill out the contact form on our website and let us know a convenient time for a callback.
sheme.text2: During our conversation, we will listen to you and offer optimal employment opportunities for work or study in Germany / the EU. We will also prepare an individual development plan for your target position.
sheme.text3: We will help you gather all the necessary documents for your application and start processing it.
sheme.text4: We will organize an online interview with potential employers or educational institutions.
sheme.text5: We will prepare you for the embassy visit and assist you with an interview for a work visa.
sheme.text6: We will help you plan your overseas trip and get ready for your first day of work.
sheme.text7: We will stay in touch with you throughout your stay in Germany to assist you with any emerging questions.
sheme.title8: We search for suitable candidates according to your requirements and conduct a preliminary selection. Based on our recommendations, you decide whom to invite for an online interview.
sheme.title9: If necessary, we will create a plan for additional qualifications or language preparation (preparation for the exam at a certified center and language courses for your specific field).
sheme.title10: Accompanying the candidate during studies, preparing documents, and coordinating organizational issues upon arrival in Germany

questions.text: What unique advantages will I gain by choosing your employment services in Germany?
questions.answer: You are working with a competent partner with rich experience in Germany and Austria. Additionally, we offer consultation considering the legislation in Germany and the EU. Our experience allows us to find solutions even in the most challenging situations, discuss the pros and cons of each option with you. We won't leave you alone with your questions. Language barrier is not an issue for us; we speak your language. We speak Russian, Kyrgyz, German, and English. Feel free to reach out to us!
questions.text2: What additional services do you offer to facilitate the employment process in Germany?
questions.answer2: General consultation on employment issues, specialized German courses for your profile and selected position, online training, support in preparing for work and during your stay in Germany, and individual online consultation for your questions.
questions.text3: How does your company support clients during the employment process and after its completion?
questions.answer3: We offer various consultations on different cooperation issues, from employment consultations to document preparation, training in various specialized training, accompanying your stay in Germany and the EU, emergency assistance in critical situations, and support for your various concerns.
questions.text4: How does your company support clients during the employment process and after its completion?
questions.answer4: Fill out the contact form, choose the subject of the inquiry, and let us know the best time for feedback (contact phone or email, contact time, and day of contact). Our specialist will contact you as soon as possible.

team.text: We are a young but experienced team operating in Germany and the EU since 1999. During this time, we have accumulated rich experience in education, project management, and EU legislation.
team.text2: We specialize in providing services and communication with applicants from the CIS countries and employers in the EU.
team.text3: Our network of contacts with employers is extensive, and we have long-term agreements for employment at different qualification levels. Whether you are looking for temporary work during study holidays or short-term employment as a specialist, we are ready to help you find a suitable position.
team.text4: We take pride in our work and strive to provide the best opportunities for those seeking employment in Germany. Our team is always ready to assist you in this important process.

Form.text: ➔Are you looking for a job abroad?

About.text: We offer a unique opportunity for students from Central Asia to work in Germany.
About.Personal: We offer employment services in Germany and the EU
About.interes: If you have interest in this program, please fill out the contact form.
About.if: If you have a specialist diploma, for example, as a truck driver, cook, electrician, nurse, or doctor, and you have had initial work experience in your profession, contact us! We will find you short-term (3 to 12 months) and long-term employment. We will find an employer for you, prepare you for the interview, and support you with questions for obtaining the work visa. If necessary, preparatory courses in foreign languages and specialties are provided.
About.text3: - Consulting and providing various services for companies and entrepreneurs in the field of innovation
About.text4: - Recruitment of specialized personnel for work abroad
About.text5: - Consulting and providing various services for companies and entrepreneurs in the field of innovation
About.text8: - Work as a certified specialist/professional with work experience
About.text9: - Work as a highly qualified specialist

employer.security2: your key to personnel in the CIS market.
employer.personal: Targeted personnel selection according to your requirements
